welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Clermont, known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in the city's unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and usage restrictions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals and serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy 30 minutes of free wifi access. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and business aviation.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
